name: No Going Back (Burnadet)
description:
You and you're mate got stuck in a dark dark place.

Your guards need no vision, these robots are activated by sound.

Escape this place by working together.  Use stealth to your advantage, but once you go up, you can't go back!

Movement with WASD and Arrow keys.

Made in co-operation with Brian de Lint.

Runs best in full-fullscreen
